00003 /***************************************************************************/
00004 /* RSC IDENTIFIER:  LOCAL CARTESIAN
00005  *
00006  * ABSTRACT
00007  *
00008  *    This component provides conversions between Geodetic coordinates (latitude,
00009  *    longitude in radians and height in meters) and Local Cartesian coordinates 
00010  *    (X, Y, Z).
00011  *
00012  * ERROR HANDLING
00013  *
00014  *    This component checks parameters for valid values.  If an invalid value
00015  *    is found, the error code is combined with the current error code using 
00016  *    the bitwise or.  This combining allows multiple error codes to be
00017  *    returned. The possible error codes are:
00018  *
00019  *      LOCCART_NO_ERROR            : No errors occurred in function
00020  *      LOCCART_LAT_ERROR           : Latitude out of valid range
00021  *                                      (-90 to 90 degrees)
00022  *      LOCCART_LON_ERROR           : Longitude out of valid range
00023  *                                      (-180 to 360 degrees)
00024  *      LOCCART_A_ERROR             : Semi-major axis less than or equal to zero
00025  *      LOCCART_INV_F_ERROR         : Inverse flattening outside of valid range
00026  *                                                                                          (250 to 350)
00027  *      LOCCART_ORIGIN_LAT_ERROR    : Origin Latitude out of valid range
00028  *                                      (-90 to 90 degrees)
00029  *      LOCCART_ORIGIN_LON_ERROR    : Origin Longitude out of valid range
00030  *                                      (-180 to 360 degrees)
00031  *                LOCCART_ORIENTATION_ERROR   : Orientation angle out of valid range
00032  *                                                                                          (-360 to 360 degrees)
00033  *
00034  *
00035  * REUSE NOTES
00036  *
00037  *    LOCCART is intended for reuse by any application that performs
00038  *    coordinate conversions between geodetic coordinates or geocentric
00039  *    coordinates and local cartesian coordinates..
00040  *    
00041  *
00042  * REFERENCES
00043  *    
00044  *    Further information on LOCAL CARTESIAN can be found in the Reuse Manual.
00045  *
00046  *    LOCCART originated from : U.S. Army Topographic Engineering Center
00047  *                              Geospatial Inforamtion Division
00048  *                              7701 Telegraph Road
00049  *                              Alexandria, VA  22310-3864
00050  *
00051  * LICENSES
00052  *
00053  *    None apply to this component.
00054  *
00055  * RESTRICTIONS
00056  *
00057  *    LOCCART has no restrictions.
00058  *
00059  * ENVIRONMENT
00060  *
00061  *    LOCCART was tested and certified in the following environments:
00062  *
00063  *    1. Solaris 2.5 with GCC version 2.8.1
00064  *    2. Windows 95 with MS Visual C++ version 6
00065  *
00066  * MODIFICATIONS
00067  *
00068  *    Date              Description
00069  *    ----              -----------
00070  *        07-16-99                          Original Code
00071  *        03-2-07                             Original C++ Code
00072  *
00073  */
00074 
00075

00079  */

00096  *    GeodeticCoordinates.h   - defines geodetic coordinates
00097  *    CoordinateConversionException.h - Exception handler
00098  *    ErrorMessages.h  - Contains exception messages
00099  */

00110 const double PI = 3.14159265358979323e0;    /* PI */
00111 const double PI_OVER_2 = ( PI / 2.0e0);                 
00112 const double TWO_PI = (2.0 * PI);

00119 
00120 LocalCartesian::LocalCartesian( double ellipsoidSemiMajorAxis, double ellipsoidFlattening, double originLongitude, double originLatitude, double originHeight, double orientation ) :
00121   CoordinateSystem(),
00122   geocentric( 0 ),        
00123   es2( 0.0066943799901413800 ),
00124   u0( 6378137.0 ),
00125   v0( 0.0 ),
00126   w0( 0.0 ),
00127   LocalCart_Origin_Long( 0.0 ),
00128   LocalCart_Origin_Lat( 0.0 ),
00129   LocalCart_Origin_Height( 0.0 ),
00130   LocalCart_Orientation( 0.0 ),
00131   Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat( 0.0 ),
00132   Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat( 1.0 ),
00133   Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon( 0.0 ),
00134   Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon( 1.0 ),
00135   Sin_LocalCart_Orientation( 0.0 ),
00136   Cos_LocalCart_Orientation( 1.0 ),
00137   Sin_Lat_Sin_Orient( 0.0 ),
00138   Sin_Lat_Cos_Orient( 0.0 )
00139 {
00140 /*
00141  * The constructor receives the ellipsoid parameters
00142  * and local origin parameters as inputs and sets the corresponding state variables.
00143  *
00144  *    ellipsoidSemiMajorAxis   : Semi-major axis of ellipsoid, in meters           (input)
00145  *    ellipsoidFlattening      : Flattening of ellipsoid                                                         (input)
00146  *    originLongitude          : Longitude of the local origin, in radians         (input)
00147  *    originLatitude           : Latitude of the local origin, in radians          (input)
00148  *    originHeight             : Ellipsoid height of the local origin, in meters   (input)
00149  *    orientation              : Orientation angle of the local cartesian coordinate system,
00150  *                               in radians                                        (input)
00151  */
00152 
00153   double N0;
00154   double inv_f = 1 / ellipsoidFlattening;
00155   double val;
00156   char errorStatus[500] = "";
00157 
00158   if (ellipsoidSemiMajorAxis <= 0.0)
00159   { /* Semi-major axis must be greater than zero */
00160     strcat( errorStatus, ErrorMessages::semiMajorAxis );
00161   }
00162   if ((inv_f < 250) || (inv_f > 350))
00163   { /* Inverse flattening must be between 250 and 350 */
00164     strcat( errorStatus, ErrorMessages::ellipsoidFlattening );
00165   }
00166   if ((originLatitude < -PI_OVER_2) || (originLatitude > PI_OVER_2))
00167   { /* origin latitude out of range */
00168     strcat( errorStatus, ErrorMessages::originLatitude );
00169   }
00170   if ((originLongitude < -PI) || (originLongitude > TWO_PI))
00171   { /* origin longitude out of range */
00172     strcat( errorStatus, ErrorMessages::originLongitude );
00173   }
00174   if ((orientation < -PI) || (orientation > TWO_PI))
00175   { /* orientation angle out of range */
00176     strcat( errorStatus, ErrorMessages::orientation );
00177   }
00178 
00179   if( strlen( errorStatus ) > 0)
00180     throw CoordinateConversionException( errorStatus );
00181 
00182   semiMajorAxis = ellipsoidSemiMajorAxis;
00183   flattening = ellipsoidFlattening;
00184 
00185   LocalCart_Origin_Lat = originLatitude;
00186   if (originLongitude > PI)
00187     originLongitude -= TWO_PI;
00188   LocalCart_Origin_Long = originLongitude;
00189   LocalCart_Origin_Height = originHeight;
00190   if (orientation > PI)
00191     orientation -= TWO_PI;
00192   LocalCart_Orientation = orientation;
00193   es2 = 2 * flattening - flattening * flattening;
00194 
00195   Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat = sin(LocalCart_Origin_Lat);
00196   Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat = cos(LocalCart_Origin_Lat);
00197   Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon = sin(LocalCart_Origin_Long);
00198   Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon = cos(LocalCart_Origin_Long);
00199   Sin_LocalCart_Orientation = sin(LocalCart_Orientation);
00200   Cos_LocalCart_Orientation = cos(LocalCart_Orientation);
00201 
00202   Sin_Lat_Sin_Orient = Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * Sin_LocalCart_Orientation;
00203   Sin_Lat_Cos_Orient = Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * Cos_LocalCart_Orientation;
00204 
00205   N0 = semiMajorAxis / sqrt(1 - es2 * Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat);
00206  
00207   val = (N0 + LocalCart_Origin_Height) * Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat;
00208   u0 = val * Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon;
00209   v0 = val * Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon;
00210   w0 = ((N0 * (1 - es2)) + LocalCart_Origin_Height) * Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat;
00211 
00212   geocentric = new Geocentric( semiMajorAxis, flattening );
00213 }
00214

00216 LocalCartesian::LocalCartesian( const LocalCartesian &lc )
00217 {
00218   geocentric = new Geocentric( *( lc.geocentric ) );
00219   semiMajorAxis = lc.semiMajorAxis;
00220   flattening = lc.flattening;
00221   es2 = lc.es2;     
00222   u0 = lc.u0; 
00223   v0 = lc.v0; 
00224   w0 = lc.w0; 
00225   LocalCart_Origin_Long = lc.LocalCart_Origin_Long; 
00226   LocalCart_Origin_Lat = lc.LocalCart_Origin_Lat; 
00227   LocalCart_Origin_Height = lc.LocalCart_Origin_Height; 
00228   LocalCart_Orientation = lc.LocalCart_Orientation; 
00229   Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat = lc.Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat; 
00230   Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat = lc.Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat; 
00231   Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon = lc.Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon; 
00232   Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon = lc.Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon; 
00233   Sin_LocalCart_Orientation = lc.Sin_LocalCart_Orientation; 
00234   Cos_LocalCart_Orientation = lc.Cos_LocalCart_Orientation; 
00235   Sin_Lat_Sin_Orient = lc.Sin_Lat_Sin_Orient; 
00236   Sin_Lat_Cos_Orient = lc.Sin_Lat_Cos_Orient; 
00237 }

00240 LocalCartesian::~LocalCartesian()
00241 {
00242   delete geocentric;
00243   geocentric = 0;
00244 }

00247 LocalCartesian& LocalCartesian::operator=( const LocalCartesian &lc )
00248 {
00249   if( this != &lc )
00250   {
00251     geocentric->operator=( *lc.geocentric );
00252     semiMajorAxis = lc.semiMajorAxis;
00253     flattening = lc.flattening;
00254     es2 = lc.es2;     
00255     u0 = lc.u0; 
00256     v0 = lc.v0; 
00257     w0 = lc.w0; 
00258     LocalCart_Origin_Long = lc.LocalCart_Origin_Long; 
00259     LocalCart_Origin_Lat = lc.LocalCart_Origin_Lat; 
00260     LocalCart_Origin_Height = lc.LocalCart_Origin_Height; 
00261     LocalCart_Orientation = lc.LocalCart_Orientation; 
00262     Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat = lc.Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat; 
00263     Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat = lc.Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat; 
00264     Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon = lc.Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon; 
00265     Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon = lc.Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon; 
00266     Sin_LocalCart_Orientation = lc.Sin_LocalCart_Orientation; 
00267     Cos_LocalCart_Orientation = lc.Cos_LocalCart_Orientation; 
00268     Sin_Lat_Sin_Orient = lc.Sin_Lat_Sin_Orient; 
00269     Sin_Lat_Cos_Orient = lc.Sin_Lat_Cos_Orient; 
00270   }
00271 
00272   return *this;
00273 }

00276 LocalCartesianParameters* LocalCartesian::getParameters() const
00277 {
00278 /*
00279  * The function getParameters returns the ellipsoid parameters
00280  * and local origin parameters.
00281  *
00282  *    ellipsoidSemiMajorAxis    : Semi-major axis of ellipsoid, in meters           (output)
00283  *    ellipsoidFlattening       : Flattening of ellipsoid                                                         (output)
00284  *    originLongitude           : Longitude of the local origin, in radians         (output)
00285  *    originLatitude            : Latitude of the local origin, in radians          (output)
00286  *    originHeight              : Ellipsoid height of the local origin, in meters   (output)
00287  *    orientation               : Orientation angle of the local cartesian coordinate system,
00288  *                                in radians                                        (output)
00289  */
00290 
00291   return new LocalCartesianParameters( CoordinateType::localCartesian, LocalCart_Origin_Long, LocalCart_Origin_Lat, LocalCart_Origin_Height, LocalCart_Orientation );
00292 }

00294 
00295 MSP::CCS::CartesianCoordinates* LocalCartesian::convertFromGeodetic( MSP::CCS::GeodeticCoordinates* geodeticCoordinates )
00296 {
00297 /*
00298  * The function convertFromGeodetic converts geodetic coordinates
00299  * (latitude, longitude, and height) to local cartesian coordinates (X, Y, Z),
00300  * according to the current ellipsoid and local origin parameters.
00301  *
00302  *    longitude : Geodetic longitude, in radians                       (input)
00303  *    latitude  : Geodetic latitude, in radians                        (input)
00304  *    Height    : Geodetic height, in meters                           (input)
00305  *    X         : Calculated local cartesian X coordinate, in meters   (output)
00306  *    Y         : Calculated local cartesian Y coordinate, in meters   (output)
00307  *    Z         : Calculated local cartesian Z coordinate, in meters   (output)
00308  *
00309  */
00310 
00311   char errorStatus[50] = "";
00312 
00313   double longitude = geodeticCoordinates->longitude();
00314   double latitude = geodeticCoordinates->latitude();
00315   double height = geodeticCoordinates->height();
00316 
00317   if ((latitude < -PI_OVER_2) || (latitude > PI_OVER_2))
00318   { /* geodetic latitude out of range */
00319     strcat( errorStatus, ErrorMessages::latitude );
00320   }
00321   if ((longitude < -PI) || (longitude > TWO_PI))
00322   { /* geodetic longitude out of range */
00323     strcat( errorStatus, ErrorMessages::longitude );
00324   }
00325 
00326   if( strlen( errorStatus ) > 0)
00327     throw CoordinateConversionException( errorStatus );
00328 
00329   CartesianCoordinates* geocentricCoordinates = geocentric->convertFromGeodetic( geodeticCoordinates );
00330 
00331   CartesianCoordinates* cartesianCoordinates = convertFromGeocentric( geocentricCoordinates );
00332   delete geocentricCoordinates;
00333 
00334   return cartesianCoordinates;
00335 }
00336 
00337 
00338 MSP::CCS::GeodeticCoordinates* LocalCartesian::convertToGeodetic( MSP::CCS::CartesianCoordinates* cartesianCoordinates )
00339 {
00340 /*
00341  * The function convertToGeodetic converts local cartesian
00342  * coordinates (X, Y, Z) to geodetic coordinates (latitude, longitude, 
00343  * and height), according to the current ellipsoid and local origin parameters.
00344  *
00345  *    X         : Local cartesian X coordinate, in meters    (input)
00346  *    Y         : Local cartesian Y coordinate, in meters    (input)
00347  *    Z         : Local cartesian Z coordinate, in meters    (input)
00348  *    longitude : Calculated longitude value, in radians     (output)
00349  *    latitude  : Calculated latitude value, in radians      (output)
00350  *    Height    : Calculated height value, in meters         (output)
00351  */
00352 
00353   CartesianCoordinates* geocentricCoordinates = convertToGeocentric( cartesianCoordinates );
00354 
00355   GeodeticCoordinates* geodeticCoordinates = geocentric->convertToGeodetic( geocentricCoordinates );
00356   double longitude = geodeticCoordinates->longitude();
00357 
00358   if (longitude > PI)
00359     geodeticCoordinates->setLongitude( longitude -= TWO_PI );
00360   longitude = geodeticCoordinates->longitude();
00361   if (longitude < -PI)
00362     geodeticCoordinates->setLongitude( longitude += TWO_PI );
00363 
00364   delete geocentricCoordinates;
00365 
00366   return geodeticCoordinates;
00367 }
00368 
00369 
00370 MSP::CCS::CartesianCoordinates* LocalCartesian::convertFromGeocentric( const MSP::CCS::CartesianCoordinates* cartesianCoordinates )
00371 {
00372 /*
00373  * The function convertFromGeocentric converts geocentric
00374  * coordinates according to the current ellipsoid and local origin parameters.
00375  *
00376  *    U         : Geocentric latitude, in meters                       (input)
00377  *    V         : Geocentric longitude, in meters                      (input)
00378  *    W         : Geocentric height, in meters                         (input)
00379  *    X         : Calculated local cartesian X coordinate, in meters   (output)
00380  *    Y         : Calculated local cartesian Y coordinate, in meters   (output)
00381  *    Z         : Calculated local cartesian Z coordinate, in meters   (output)
00382  *
00383  */
00384 
00385   double X, Y, Z;
00386   double u_MINUS_u0, v_MINUS_v0, w_MINUS_w0;
00387 
00388   double U = cartesianCoordinates->x();
00389   double V = cartesianCoordinates->y();
00390   double W = cartesianCoordinates->z();
00391 
00392   u_MINUS_u0 = U - u0;
00393   v_MINUS_v0 = V - v0;
00394   w_MINUS_w0 = W - w0;
00395 
00396   if (LocalCart_Orientation == 0.0)
00397   {
00398     double cos_lon_u_MINUS_u0 = Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon * u_MINUS_u0;
00399     double sin_lon_v_MINUS_v0 = Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon * v_MINUS_v0;
00400 
00401     X = -Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon * u_MINUS_u0 + Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon * v_MINUS_v0;
00402     Y = -Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * cos_lon_u_MINUS_u0 + -Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * sin_lon_v_MINUS_v0 + Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * w_MINUS_w0;
00403     Z = Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * cos_lon_u_MINUS_u0 + Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * sin_lon_v_MINUS_v0 + Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * w_MINUS_w0;
00404   }
00405   else
00406   {
00407     double cos_lat_w_MINUS_w0 = Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * w_MINUS_w0;
00408 
00409     X = (-Cos_LocalCart_Orientation * Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon + Sin_Lat_Sin_Orient * Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon) * u_MINUS_u0 +
00410          (Cos_LocalCart_Orientation * Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon + Sin_Lat_Sin_Orient * Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon) * v_MINUS_v0 +
00411          (-Sin_LocalCart_Orientation * cos_lat_w_MINUS_w0);
00412 
00413     Y = (-Sin_LocalCart_Orientation * Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon - Sin_Lat_Cos_Orient * Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon) * u_MINUS_u0 +
00414          (Sin_LocalCart_Orientation * Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon - Sin_Lat_Cos_Orient * Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon) * v_MINUS_v0 +
00415          (Cos_LocalCart_Orientation * cos_lat_w_MINUS_w0);
00416 
00417     Z = (Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon) * u_MINUS_u0 +
00418          (Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon) * v_MINUS_v0 +
00419          Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * w_MINUS_w0;
00420   }
00421 
00422   return new CartesianCoordinates( CoordinateType::localCartesian, X, Y, Z );
00423 }
00424 
00425 
00426 MSP::CCS::CartesianCoordinates* LocalCartesian::convertToGeocentric( const MSP::CCS::CartesianCoordinates* cartesianCoordinates )
00427 {
00428 /*
00429  * The function Convert_Local_Cartesian_To_Geocentric converts local cartesian
00430  * coordinates (x, y, z) to geocentric coordinates (X, Y, Z) according to the 
00431  * current ellipsoid and local origin parameters.
00432  *
00433  *    X         : Local cartesian X coordinate, in meters    (input)
00434  *    Y         : Local cartesian Y coordinate, in meters    (input)
00435  *    Z         : Local cartesian Z coordinate, in meters    (input)
00436  *    U         : Calculated U value, in meters              (output)
00437  *    V         : Calculated v value, in meters              (output)
00438  *    W         : Calculated w value, in meters              (output)
00439  */
00440 
00441   double U, V, W;
00442 
00443   double X = cartesianCoordinates->x();
00444   double Y = cartesianCoordinates->y(); 
00445   double Z = cartesianCoordinates->z();
00446 
00447   if (LocalCart_Orientation == 0.0)
00448   {
00449     double sin_lat_y = Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * Y;
00450     double cos_lat_z = Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * Z;
00451 
00452     U = -Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon * X - sin_lat_y * Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon + cos_lat_z * Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon + u0;
00453     V = Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon * X -  sin_lat_y * Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon + cos_lat_z * Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon + v0;
00454     W = Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * Y + Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * Z + w0;
00455   }
00456   else
00457   {
00458     double rotated_x, rotated_y;
00459     double rotated_y_sin_lat, z_cos_lat;
00460 
00461     rotated_x = Cos_LocalCart_Orientation * X + Sin_LocalCart_Orientation * Y;
00462     rotated_y = -Sin_LocalCart_Orientation * X + Cos_LocalCart_Orientation * Y;
00463 
00464     rotated_y_sin_lat = rotated_y * Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat;
00465     z_cos_lat = Z * Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat;
00466 
00467     U = -Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon * rotated_x - Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon * rotated_y_sin_lat + Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon * z_cos_lat + u0;
00468     V = Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lon * rotated_x -  Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon * rotated_y_sin_lat + Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lon * z_cos_lat + v0;
00469     W = Cos_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * rotated_y + Sin_LocalCart_Origin_Lat * Z + w0;
00470   }
00471 
00472   return new CartesianCoordinates( CoordinateType::geocentric, U, V, W );
00473 }

Generated on Tue Aug 3 10:29:08 2010 for MSP GEOTRANS by  1.6.1
